descriptionOfService.p1: BluPresenter is a web-based lyrics and chords archive and presentation tool that allows you to create, manage, and display lyrics and chords online. The service includes features such as:
list: Creating and editing songs
Organizing content within organizations
Displaying presentations through a controller interface
Collaborating with other users
